description: Decorated in soft colours, the elegant gourmet restaurant on the first floor (lift available) serves classic regional dishes reinterpreted with a contemporary flavour and hint of modernity. At the Tuscan Bistro on the ground floor, the menu is simpler in style but just as delicious and firmly rooted in the traditions of the local area.
